name: mcp-wireshark
description: MCP server for Wireshark/tshark integration - capture live network traffic, parse pcap files, apply display filters, and analyze network protocols with AI assistance
author: Khang Nguyen Huynh

requirements.name: Wireshark/tshark
requirements.description: Wireshark network analyzer with tshark CLI tool

tools.name: list_interfaces
tools.description: List all available network interfaces for packet capture

tools.name: live_capture
tools.description: Capture live network traffic from a specified interface

tools.name: read_pcap
tools.description: Read and analyze packets from .pcap or .pcapng files

tools.name: display_filter
tools.description: Apply Wireshark display filters to packet data

tools.name: stats_by_proto
tools.description: Generate protocol statistics from capture files

tools.name: follow_tcp
tools.description: Follow TCP streams and extract payload data

tools.name: export_json
tools.description: Export packets to JSON format for further analysis

examples.prompt: List all network interfaces available for capture
Capture HTTP traffic on eth0 for 30 seconds
Analyze the pcap file and show DNS queries
